top.title: Trump's claim Nato troops avoided Afghanistan front line sparks outrage in UK
top.summary: The US president says Nato troops stayed "a little off the front lines" - despite 457 UK military deaths in the conflict.

top.title: Russia, Ukraine and US to hold trilateral talks in Abu Dhabi
top.summary: The meeting between the three countries comes as both Ukraine and Russia say no peace deal can be reached until territorial issues are resolved.

top.title: 'I didn't hear from my son for seven months': Inside Yemen's UAE-run secret prisons
top.summary: The BBC sees sites on former United Arab Emirates bases in Yemen where detainees say they were abused.

top.title: TikTok closes deal to split US app from global business
top.summary: The app was due to be banned in the US a year ago if its Chinese owner didn't sell its business in America.

top.title: Ubisoft cancels six games including Prince of Persia and closes studios
top.summary: The studio, known for Assassin's Creed and Just Dance, is also delaying seven titles in a restructure.

top.title: AI ready: The advantages of being a young entrepreneur
top.summary: The latest generation of entrepreneurs have a head-start with AI but also face familiar challenges.

title.#text: Google won’t stop replacing our news headlines with terrible AI
Microsoft Paint can now make AI coloring books
The TikTok deal is done, finally
